TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AnonymousPipeServerStream extends System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream
Public NotInheritable Class AnonymousPipeServerStream Inherits PipeStream
public ref class AnonymousPipeServerStream sealed : System::IO::Pipes::PipeStream

summary.span: 公开匿名管道周围的流，该管道既支持同步读写操作，也支持异步读写操作。

span.span: Exposes a stream around an anonymous pipe, which supports both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 匿名管道帮助提供安全和保护的进程的子父项之间的进程间通信。Anonymous pipes help provide safe and secure interprocess communication between child and parent processes. 类，父进程可以发送或接收来自子进程的信息。The class enables a parent process to send or receive information from a child process. 匿名管道是未命名，单向通常父和子进程之间传输数据的管道。Anonymous pipes are unnamed, one-way pipes that typically transfer data between parent and child processes. 匿名管道始终是局部;它们不能通过网络使用。Anonymous pipes are always local; they cannot be used over a network. 一个的值不支持，因为匿名管道定义为单向。A value of is not supported because anonymous pipes are defined to be one-way. 不支持匿名管道读取模式。Anonymous pipes do not support read modes. 匿名管道的客户端必须从提供的服务器端通过调用的管道句柄创建方法。The client side of an anonymous pipe must be created from a pipe handle provided by the server side by calling the method. 创建客户端进程时，然后传递将字符串作为参数。The string is then passed as a parameter when creating the client process. 从客户端进程，然后传递给构造函数、 作为`pipeHandleAsString`参数。From the client process, it is then passed to the constructor as the `pipeHandleAsString` parameter. 对象必须释放客户端句柄使用方法，以在客户端退出时得到通知。The object must dispose the client handle using the method in order to be notified when the client exits. > [!NOTE] > 有关[!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/includes/winxppro-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/includes/win2kserver-md.md)]，最多 10 个管道可以通过网络同时连接。For [!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/includes/winxppro-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/includes/win2kserver-md.md)], a maximum of 10 pipes can simultaneously connect over the network. ## Examples 下面的示例展示了如何使用匿名管道将字符串从父进程发送到子进程。The following example demonstrates a way to send a string from a parent process to a child process using anonymous pipes. 此示例在父进程中创建 对象，它的 值为 。This example creates an object in a parent process with a value of . 它还会创建对象中使用的子进程的值。It also creates an object in a child process with a value of . 接下来，父进程将用户提供的字符串发送给子进程。The parent process then sends a user-supplied string to the child process. 该字符串显示到控制台。The string is displayed to the console. 此示例适用于服务器过程中，使用类。This example is for the server process, which uses the class. 有关完整的代码示例，包括代码管道客户端和服务器，请参阅[如何： 使用匿名管道进行本地进程间通信](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-anonymous-pipes-for-local-interprocess-communication.md)。For the entire code example, including the code for both the pipe client and server, see [How to: Use Anonymous Pipes for Local Interprocess Communication](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-anonymous-pipes-for-local-interprocess-communication.md). [!code-cpp[System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream_Sample#01](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream_Sample/cpp/program.cpp#01)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream_Sample#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream_Sample/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream_Sample#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.AnonymousPipeServerStream_Sample/vb/program.vb#01)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关构造函数而无需参数的默认方向是。For constructors without a parameter, the default direction is . 一个的值不支持，因为匿名管道定义为单向。A value of is not supported because anonymous pipes are defined to be one-way. 此构造函数创建都有默认缓冲区大小，没有管道安全性的对象和一个的值。This constructor creates an object that has the default buffer size, no pipe security, and a value of .

summary.span: 获取 对象的安全句柄，当前该对象连接到 对象。

value.span: 对象的句柄，当前该对象连接到 对象。

span.span: A handle for the object that is currently connected to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端句柄传递到客户端进程后，应调用方法。The method should be called after a client handle has been passed to a client process. 如果未调用此方法，对象不会收到通知时该客户端释放其对象。If this method is not called, the object will not receive notice when the client disposes of its object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端句柄传递到客户端后，应调用方法。The method should be called after the client handle has been passed to the client. 如果未调用此方法，对象不会收到通知时该客户端释放其对象。If this method is not called, the object will not receive notice when the client disposes of its object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一种方法将字符串从父进程发送到子进程，通过使用匿名管道。The following example demonstrates a way to send a string from a parent process to a child process by using anonymous pipes. 在此示例中，在与父进程中创建对象的值。In this example, an object is created in a parent process with a value of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端句柄传递到客户端进程后，应调用方法。The method should be called after a client handle has been passed to a client process. 如果未调用此方法，对象不会收到通知时该客户端释放其对象。If this method is not called, the object will not receive notice when the client disposes of its object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一种方法将字符串从父进程发送到子进程，通过使用匿名管道。The following example demonstrates a way to send a string from a parent process to a child process by using anonymous pipes. 在此示例中，在与父进程中创建对象的值。In this example, an object is created in a parent process with a value of .
